languages.text: Лишь в краткие моменты визитов Кассии Орселлио сквозь бесстрастную маску вновь проступало лицо старой Идиры. Силы навигатора позволяли Кассии наполнить ее разум эмоциями, но заряд их быстро иссякал, стоило старой подруге отбыть.

Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.
languages.original_text: Лишь в краткие моменты визитов Кассии Орселлио сквозь бесстрастную маску вновь проступало лицо старой Идиры. Силы навигатора позволяли Кассии наполнить ее разум эмоциями, но заряд их быстро иссякал, стоило старой подруге отбыть.

traits.locale_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira's face resurface from under the impassive mask. The Navigator's powers let Cassia to fill her mind with emotion, but the they quickly faded after her old friend's departure.

Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira's face resurface from under the impassive mask. The Navigator's powers let Cassia to fill her mind with emotion, but the they quickly faded after her old friend's departure.

Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

languages.text: 只有当卡西娅·奥赛罗造访的短暂期间，老伊迪拉才会摘下冷漠的面具。卡西娅的导航者能力可以让她的老朋友再次充满了情感，然而当卡西娅离开之后，那些焕发出来的情感很快就会再次消失。
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: 只有当卡西娅·奥塞罗造访的短暂期间，老伊迪拉才会摘下冷漠的面具。卡西娅的导航者能力可以让她的老朋友再次充满了情感，然而当卡西娅离开之后，那些焕发出来的情感很快就会再次消失。

languages.text: カシア・オーセリオが訪問するほんの短い時間だけ、老いたイディラは無表情の仮面を外した。カシア航宙士の力は古くからの友人の心を感情で満たすことができたが、それらの感情は航宙士が去るとすぐに消えてしまった。
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: カシア・オーセリオが訪問するほんの短い時間だけ、老いたイディラは無表情の仮面を外した。カシア航宙士の力は古くからの友人の心を感情で満たすことができたが、それらの感情は航宙士が去るとすぐに消えてしまった。

languages.text: La vieille Idira ne réapparaissait sous son masque impassible que lors des brèves visites de Cassia Orsellio. Les pouvoirs de navigation de Cassia lui permettaient d'emplir l'esprit de sa vieille amie de diverses émotions, mais celles-ci s'estompaient rapidement après le départ de la navigatrice.
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: La vieille Idira ne réapparaissait sous son masque impassible que lors des brèves visites de Cassia Orsellio. Les pouvoirs de navigation de Cassia lui permettaient d'emplir l'esprit de sa vieille amie de diverses émotions, mais celles-ci s'estompaient rapidement après le départ de la navigatrice.

languages.text: La vieja Idira solo asomaba tras su máscara impasible durante las breves visitas de Cassia Orsellio. Los poderes de Navegante de Cassia le daban la capacidad de devolver las emociones a su vieja amiga, pero se apagaban de nuevo poco después de la marcha de la Navegante.
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: La vieja Idira solo asomaba tras su máscara impasible durante las breves visitas de Cassia Orsellio. Los poderes de Navegante de Cassia le daban la capacidad de devolver las emociones a su vieja amiga, pero se apagaban de nuevo poco después de la marcha de la Navegante.

languages.text: Nur in kurzen Momenten während der Besuche von Cassia kam die alte Idira Orsellio unter ihrer bewegungslosen Maske zum Vorschein. Cassias Kräfte als Navigatorin gestatteten es ihr, den Geist ihrer alten Freundin mit Emotionen zu füllen, aber nach ihrer Abreise schwanden sie immer recht bald wieder.
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: Nur in kurzen Momenten während der Besuche von Cassia kam die alte Idira Orsellio unter ihrer bewegungslosen Maske zum Vorschein. Cassias Kräfte als Navigatorin gestatteten es ihr, den Geist ihrer alten Freundin mit Emotionen zu füllen, aber nach ihrer Abreise schwanden sie immer recht bald wieder.

languages.text: Kayıtsız maskesinin altındaki eski İdira; yalnızca Cassia Orsellio'nun ziyaretleri sırasında, nadiren yüzeye çıkıyordu. Cassia'nın Rotacı güçleri, eski dostunun zihnini duygularla doldurmasına olanak veriyor. Ancak bu duygular, Rotacı ayrıldıktan sonra yeniden solup gidiyordu.
languages.original_text: Only in the brief moments of Cassia Orsellio's visits did the old Idira resurface from under the impassive mask. Cassia's Navigator's powers enabled her to fill her old friend's mind with emotions, but they always faded soon after the Navigator's departure.

traits.locale_text: Kayıtsız maskesinin altındaki eski İdira, yalnızca Cassia Orsellio'nun ziyaretleri sırasında, nadiren yüzeye çıkıyordu. Cassia'nın Rotacı güçleri, eski dostunun zihnini duygularla doldurmasına olanak veriyordu ancak Rotacı ayrıldıktan sonra yeniden solup gidiyorlardı.
